100.text: The QA Session has not been initialized.  Would you like to initialize this Space as a QA Space?  Please reply with group to make this the group Space, moderator to make this a moderator Space, or no to decline.

101.text: The QA Session has not been initialized and must be initialized from a group Space.  Please repost your question after the QA session has been initialized.

102.text: Thanks, I'll enter that as your group Space.  Please type in a name for a new Space to be used as your moderator Space

103.text: Thanks, I'll enter that as your moderator Space.  Please type in a name for a new Space to be used as your group Space

105.text: I didn't get that.  Please reply with group to make this the group Space, moderator to make this a moderator Space, or no to decline.

106.text: Welcome to the QA session.  Please do not post directly to this space.  Moderators, please respond to questions in the Moderator's Space.  Users, you can ask a question by clicking the plus sign in the spark client, choosing contact a person and enter this address:

107.text: Welcome to the Moderator Space.  Please respond to all questions in the form of @<botname> <msgnumber> <answer>.   ie @qabot 17 my favorite color is blue.

108.text: You can upload moderators in file by entering @<botname> moderators in a message with the file, or upload users by entering @<botname> users in a message with the file.  Format the file so that all email addresses are on one line separated by commas ','.  It's ok if the line wraps to the next line.

202.text: Your question has been submitted and will appear in the group room when it is answered.  Your question number is
